text: Hello! I'm your Foodie Chatbot. I can help you find the best street food. What city are you interested in?
Great! What type of cuisine are you in the mood for?
Are you looking for vegetarian, non-vegetarian, or options for both?
Is there any specific dish you're craving (e.g., Biryani, Dosa, Vada Pav, Pizza)? (Optional - press Enter to skip)
What kind of ambiance are you looking for?
